q: executive chairman, "a lot of my time" will be devoted to dealing with regulators and other government officials, Eric Schmidt said. "We've got very complicated government issues," he said, adding that we move quickly, and we tend to be disruptive at scale. European Union officials opened a formal antitrust probe last year into Google search results, while in China the company opted to shut down its mainland search engine rather than censor results for user queries. Hyper, effusive and giddy, Steven Tyler 's child-like energy alone sets him apart from the staid and sometimes icy Simon Cowell , who quit after last season. Sergio Marchionne said in the next two to three years, Chrysler and Fiat could ultimately merge to form a single company, adding for all I know it could be based here. But there is a laundry list of things to do before a merger of Fiat and Chrysler could happen, including the refinancing of debt and the IPO, Sergio Marchionne said.
